Class Decrypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • Decrypt

  • public class Decrypt
extends java.lang.Object
    Decrypts a message that has been previously encrypted

      Decrypt()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Decrypt

        public Decrypt()

    • Method Detail

      • convertChar

        private char convertChar(char c,
                         int n)
        Shifts the given char back n indexes to the unencrypted char
        Parameters:
        c - current char in input message
        n - number of times to shift back in alphabet array
        Returns:
        character that is n indices before c

      • decryptMessage

        public void decryptMessage(java.lang.String keyFileLocation,
                           java.lang.String messageFileLocation)
                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Opens the key file and takes in the starting point. Opens the message file and stores the message into a char array. Iterates simultaneously through the char array and key file to convert each char using ConvertChar() method.
        Parameters:
        keyFileLocation - path of the key file
        messageFileLocation - path of the message file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - exception thrown if file isn't found
